title: Guns or weed? Trump's DOJ says you can't use both.
shortDescription: The Justice Department is appealing a lower court's ruling that a federal ban on drug users having guns can't be based solely on past drug use.

title: White House launches TikTok account: 'America we are BACK!
shortDescription: Trump has a soft spot for the popular app, crediting it with helping him gain support among young voters when he defeated Kamala Harris in 2024.

title: Trump complains Smithsonian is too fixated on 'how bad slavery was'
shortDescription: Presiden Trump said the Smithsonian museums are too fixated on "how bad slavery was" and other negative aspects of United States history.

title: Trump rules out troops in Ukraine
shortDescription: White House Press Secretary Karoline Leavitt told the press President Trump has ruled out boots on the ground in Ukraine for peacekeeping.

title: Maps show which states see the largest average tax cuts in 2026
shortDescription: Taxpayers in every state will experience an average deduction in federal taxes, analysis from the Tax Foundation found.

title: Trump goal to abolish mail-in voting sparks debate for next elections
shortDescription: Trump's goal to end mail-in voting sparked a legislative debate and threats of legal challenges for any potential executive order.

title: California Republicans sue to hold up Democratic redistricting plan
shortDescription: The lawsuit comes as Gov. Gavin Newsom seeks to grow California's US House Democratic delegation to match a Texas plan to net the GOP five more seats.

title: Trump in talks about 10% government stake in troubled chipmaker Intel
shortDescription: An Intel deal would be one of the largest government interventions in private industry since the U.S. auto industry's bailout under President Obama.

title: Trump hot mic remark on Putin
shortDescription: President Donald Trump was caught on a hot mic telling French President Emmanuel Macron that Vladimir Putin “wants to make a deal for me.”

title: Democrats have a target if they succeed in the midterms
shortDescription: House Minority Leader Hakeem Jeffries promised that the secretary of the Department of Homeland Security would be among the first to face new probes.

title: Why a lawmaker spent the night in the Texas Capitol
shortDescription: Texas Republicans ordered Democrats to be monitored by police officers amid the state's redistricting fight.

title: Trump tariffs are leaving Black beauty businesses in peril
shortDescription: Black beauty salons and wholesalers have been hit hard by U.S. President Donald Trump’s tariffs.

title: Trump makes private comment to Macron on hot mic about Putin deal
shortDescription: President Trump hosted European leaders on Aug. 18. In a private comment to French President Emmanuel Macron caught on a hot mic, he mentioned a deal.

title: Trump shows his '4 more years' hat after meeting with Zelenskyy
shortDescription: Trump shows a red "4 more years" cap to Zelenskyy and Macron. Trump, in his second term, is barred from running for a third one.

title: Trump says U.S. troops won't be involved in Ukraine peacekeeping
shortDescription: Asked in an interview "what kind of assurance" there is that US troops won't be involved in Ukraine after the war, Trump said "You have my assurance."

title: Texas state rep. spends night at state Capitol
shortDescription: Texas Rep. Nicole Collier protested GOP redistricting and DPS monitoring by spending a night at the state Capitol.

title: The good news and bad news as Trump seeks Ukraine deal with Putin
shortDescription: Hurtling toward talks between Zelenskyy and Putin, the days of slow-as-you-go diplomacy are clearly over in the age of Trump.

title: What we know about Trump’s rush for peace deal
shortDescription: President Donald Trump’s rush for a Ukraine peace deal raises concerns among European leaders and President Volodymyr Zelenskyy. Here's what we know.

title: Indiana's GOP congressional leaders push redistricting as state reps meet
shortDescription: Every GOP U.S. representatives posted on X urging Statehouse Republicans to redistrict as some of them met privately to discuss President Trump's wish.

title: Zelenskyy avoids White House mauling. Will he meet with his archenemy Putin?
shortDescription: 'I think he wants to make a deal for me,' Trump was caught a saying about Russian leader Vladimir Putin. Is the next step a meeting between enemies?

title: Daily Briefing: Trump calls Putin
shortDescription: Plus: Hurricane Erin, Texas redistricting, 'Skibidi' and Bama Rush. Here is the news to know on Tuesday.
